#cloud-config
timezone: Asia/Tokyo
password: vagrant

  - ssh-rsa 
  - ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIN1YdxBpNlzxDqfJyw/QKow1F+wvG9hXGoqiysfJOn5Y
chpasswd: { expire: False }
